thread.title: Avila leads Somerset over Southside
thread.title_full: Avila leads Somerset over Southside - San Antonio Express-News

author: Ben Baby
title: Avila leads Somerset over Southside
text:
Prior to the start of the season, Somerset was looking forward to having sophomore Zadock Dinkelmann lead the Bulldogs’ offense.
But when the LSU pledge suffered a season-ending injury before it started, the weight of the offense shifted to the shoulders of running back Josh Avila .
He delivered when Somerset needed it the most on Friday night at Southside ISD stadium.
Avila’s final touchdown of the night was the deciding score in a 23-16 win over Southside. The senior scampered for a 34-yard touchdown run with 1:57 remaining in the game to seal the District 29-5A victory.
For more, visit ExpressNews.com.
